resources.string: Baby steps, come back next year
If you continue you agree with the

UNES is a tool to help students during the academic live. UNES will periodically fetch the data available at the [Sagres Portal] (http://academico2.uefs.br/Portal/Acesso.aspx) e ir√° te mandar notifica√ß√µes quando alguma mudan√ßa nos dados for detectada. People who contribute to project on GitHub
Don\'t worry, we will try again later
None of today\'s event matches the filters
These information help UNES to identify you better and offer you a personalized experience. Select a picture and a course
When you select your course UNES shows you only the events and other things that are relevant to you
These configurations control the behaviour of the application. You may change them later
This controls how often UNES will try to connect to the Sagres to find new information
No PDF Reader installed, please, download some at the PlayStore
The grade from %1$s of the discipline %2$s is available
A nota da %1$s da disciplina %2$s est√° dispon√≠vel\n\nPerfect
A nota da %1$s da disciplina %2$s est√° dispon√≠vel\n\nYou are safe! You can chill!
A nota da %1$s da disciplina %2$s est√° dispon√≠vel\n\nI don\'t know about that, Rick
A nota da %1$s da disciplina %2$s est√° dispon√≠vel\n\nMr Stark, please, I don\'t wanna die
You got a %1$s at the evaluation from the discipline %2$s
The %1$s from the discipline %2$s was created, but there are no grades associated
The grade from the evaluation %1$s from the discipline %2$s has changed
The date of an evaluation changed
The date of the evaluation %1$s from the discipline %2$s changed
This discipline was not loaded yet
There are no files attached to this class
You did not miss any class!
The classes from this discipline were not defined yet
There are no groups for this discipline, this might be an error
A lot of cool stuff is about to come
The app has a new look
Don\'t forget about your activities! They are a big part of the knowledge construction.
UNES was not able to access SAGRES using the current password :(
Adventure client is null, leave the adventure and get back in
Accuracy of location is not high enough yet
All grades will be downloaded in order for the feature work as expected
UNES need special permission to run on your smartphone
[Settings > Installed Apps > Permissions > Auto start > Allow UNES]
Google play does not want to show achievements, leave the adventure and try again
It is not possible to receive location updates

UNES has grown to a point where free tools can not support it anymore. (Donations did not work, although I like Wikipedia, I have never donated to it). Long history short, app may have ads from now on, don\'t worry, it will be only 2 ads per day. I hope this can make the app pay for itself and bring us great features
You are connected to the UNESVerse!
Accomplish any of the actions below to unlock the theme
Invite someone to the dark side
Accomplishing more than one action will grant you invites. Click the button below to unlock the dark theme for someone
The server said you have no invites. The server is always right.
Tell me the SAGRES username of the person that will receive the gift. This person needs to be connected to the UNESVerse
Who do you wish to gift?

If you type the wrong name or if the person already has the dark theme your invite might be consumed anyways :) Also, it may happen that the person does not receive the gift because it is not connected :))
This user was not found at the UNESVerse
The name shall not be empty
The web demand is open. You can do it using UNES!
The demand may be done using the app. This is a open beta feature, you might find errors.
A notification will be shown with the result soon
We are done! We may continue to the next step!
You do not have absences registered at this discipline
The document is not available on SAGRES
UNES will download many of the messages ever sent to you
Log in using the username instead of email
Editor of SIECOMP. Nothing too fancy here. You must be authorized and playing a game in order to change stuff!
* Calculated using the data of %1$d students
Rate your teachers! Tell what you think about the classes and the diverse methodologies you found!

Well, we are always the ones getting evaluated, now it is our turn to evaluate teachers and the way they teach us stuff. Here you may check and rate the teachers and discipline based on your own oppinion
Your device was not able to open Google Play Games correctly
Get the news about the exchange program!
By enabling this feature you will receive notifications about AERI during a data sync
Select a material linked to this class to view it
Thanks from evaluating! Your answers will help other people in the future
This may take a while. If you leave this screen this might restart :)
Failed to connect to the Unesverse
A error occurred and the app was not able to access the information. Try again
The page is not available on SAGRES
The text should not be empty
What do you want to say?
This field must be a number
This are the flowcharts, select one to see details
Google Play Services is not updated and can\'t process this request
There\'s is a login in progress already
In order to show precise statistics, everyone need to contribute. So, do you want to help with the disciplines you participated?
Hold on while I take care of everything
Before starting, UNES will download the details of all the disciplines. We will meet again soon
There is a update waiting for you! Check out the Google Play!
Update failed, look for it on the Google Play :/
The update is ready to be installed
Open the app again to apply changes
It seems like the semesters are not ordered
UNES is not able to access the portal with this password. Please insert the new one so it can work again!

The app was not installed using the Google Play Store thus this version is not supported.

UNES uses some features like on demand feature and optimal delivery that makes the app to not behave properly if not installed correctly, with might induce errors or crashes on your device.

It's highly recommended that you install the app directly from the Google Play Store and not download a APK from somewhere else.

I've spent 25 dols on it, please let's not waste it
The adventure is a series of achievements for some actions that you complete at the university, like completing disciplines, high grades, strikes, and lots of things
Your email account will be associated to this Sagres Account, so you will only unlock achievements on this account
Add a grade to the math of the final countdown e see what you will face
If you opt for this action, you will also not be able to see the statistics
Select a institution so UNES may login correctly. If your institution is not on the list, add an issue at the GitHub project so we can talk about it
Whenever you near somewhere that unlocks a achievement...
The information was not found at the Student Portal.\nDon\'t worry, as soon as they become available again, UNES will save it.
The attachment %1$s was linked to the discipline %2$s
The countdown starts when you insert your grades, wildcard and face your destiny
Your mean is %1$.1f. You will need %2$.1f on finals to pa
If you get %1$.1f on the wildcards, you will need %2$.1f on finals to pass
You may zero the wildcard and will pass anyway
You need %1$.1f on each wildcard to pass
You lost! Be back next semester
Let UNES tell me this grade (Wildcard)

Do you know Barril de Boas? No? Basically students vote to say if a teacher is Barril or de Boas.

This version is a increment to that, if you contribute your grades will anonymously used to compose a general mean about teachers and disciplines, also you'll may vote if the teacher is barril or de boas.

In the end of the day, you will have a tool that enables you to judge whether take or not that discipline with that person you never heard about
You got no user or password?????
The version %1$s of the app is up
The next steps are under development
There is no documents on this category
There is not statistics about this discipline
You are not connect, please leave the adventure and get back in
%1$s wrote to you. Check your profile!
This version is too old and is not supported. Please update the app to continue using.
Mark your favorite sessions so it gets easier to find them
Join the Computer Engineering Integration Week. Watch talks, workshops and meet the course
It\'s not possible to open messages with multiple links
Failed to open settings, configure manually or send me an e-mail
You need do give permissions to check location
UNES needs location acess to identify when you are in the campus dependency or it\'s internal network
Score 50,000 points or more in a single match. Hint: it is possible to go beyond 2048
Have a 8h ou more schedule in a single day and complete all 7 location related achievements.\n\nYes, you need to go on all of them again.
Get a total of 2200 hours of disciplines. Doesn\'t matter if you passed, lost, went to finals, quit, or whatever, it just need to be on your curriculum.\n\nYou have %1$d hours
The request %1$s is being observed by UNES
Some brands prevent the app auto start, this will try to take you to the right place
Some brands prohibit apps to execute when they are closed, see how to solve it
Adds or removes feature of the app
Controls whether the tab and the function should be installed or not
A AutoStartManager was not found for this brand and device
The calculated score is an estimate based on all your grades
What you wish to be notified about?
A evaluation was created without grades attached
A teacher changed the evaluation date
The result of a evaluation is available
Notify when teacher post an attachment
Notify when a teacher posts a message
Notify when you receive an university announcement
A statement was added to your profile
The proxy was changed, close the app to apply changes
The proxy entered is invalid. It must follow the pattern IP:port
UNES will not show empty days on schedule
UNES will show empty days on schedule
Detect internal network to use proxy automatically
Number of times the app fetches discipline data (helps saving data)
You phone brand might require special permissions for the app to work correctly
( Õ°¬∞ Õú ñ Õ°¬∞) Student discovery will be introduced in the future
Google couldn\'t handle requests right now
u n d e f i n e d
Teacher evaluation is here (back?) The Zhonya\'s Paradox
In some brands, autostart is blocked
The UNESVerse is a shared experiences manager on UNES.\n\nAll functions that requires other students are managed by the universe UNES.
Yes, you need to unlock it, I took too long to give you this straight up
This user is already on the dark side
Error. The server didn\'t allow this operation. A lot of things might happened
By continuing you agree on not posting hateful or mean comments. If you get reported for bad behaviour, your comment might be deleted and you may get banned from the app without notice ;)
Write a statement about this person
You are not connected to the UNESVerse. Login again might solve it
You bought an item that has no name on it!
You can\'t miss a class anymore
You surpassed the missed class limit
Now you can pick you favorite color and use in the app!
Displaying as received by the website
In some brands, like Xiaomi, enable this might solve the problems
Sync frequency redefined to 1 hour to save battery
The login was skipped... Captcha ruins everything
An absence was registered in class %1$s
Removing battery restrictions avoids sync issues
You\'ve just bought a new consumable item
Notify me when an absence is marked or removed
Grades from this period wasn\'t downloaded yet
